scripts.clean: rm -rf tests-out/ && rm -rf test-results/ && rm -rf playwright-report/
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npx tsc --incremental --project tsconfig.json --outDir tests-out && npx tsc-alias --project tsconfig.json --outDir tests-out && cp .env tests-out/
scripts.test: npm run check && npm run compile && npx playwright test $spec -c tests-out
scripts.debug: npm run compile && npx playwright test $spec --debug -c tests-out
scripts.screenshot: npm run compile && npx playwright test $spec --update-snapshots -c tests-out
